metadata.description: Sets up Fastlane CI/CD pipeline with match code signing for iOS apps, including GitHub Actions workflows and TestFlight deployment.

plugins.name: fastlane-cicd
plugins.description: Sets up Fastlane CI/CD pipeline with match code signing for iOS apps, including GitHub Actions workflows and TestFlight deployment. Use when setting up automated builds, TestFlight deployment, or App Store releases for Xcode projects.
